name: unrig-our-economy
description: This guide provides step-by-step instructions on how to: - 🔑 Obtain an **OAuth2 Access Token** from Kroger's API - 🏬 Retrieve **store locations** - 🛍 Fetch **product details** (requires explicit scope)

scripts.deploy: npm run build-client && npm run start-api && npm run start-client
scripts.stop: pm2 stop unrig-api && pm2 stop unrig-client
scripts.restart: pm2 restart unrig-api && pm2 restart unrig-client
